languages.text: "{name}, мои техносоратники провели в молитвах и бдении предзаданное число циклов. Все готово к комплементат-ритуалу очищения. Старт потребует ключ-авторизации через кровь представителя династии. Если ты готов{mf||а} — помести ладонь в приемный блок кибергоргульи".

traits.locale_text: "{name}, мои собратья провели в молитвах и бдении предзаданное число циклов. Все готово к комплиментат-ритуалу очищения. Старт потребует ключ-авторизации через кровь представителя династии. Если ты готов{mf||а} — помести ладонь в приемный блок кибергоргульи".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "{name}, my tech-comrades have spent the assigned number of cycles in prayer and vigil. Everything is prepared for the complementa-ritual of cleansing. Its commencement will require an authorisation key in the form of the blood of a von Valancius. If you are ready, place a hand into the cybergargoyle's receiving module."
languages.original_text: "{name}, мои техносоратники провели в молитвах и бдении предзаданное число циклов. Все готово к комплементат-ритуалу очищения. Старт потребует ключ-авторизации через кровь представителя династии. Если ты готов{mf||а} — помести ладонь в приемный блок кибергоргульи".

Its commencement will require an authorisation key in the form of the blood of a von Valancius. If you are ready, place a hand into the cybergargoyle's receiving module."

Its commencement will require an authorisation key in the form of the blood of a von Valancius. If you are ready, place a hand into the cybergargoyle's receiving module."

Its commencement will require an authorisation key in the form of the blood of a von Valancius. If you are ready, place a hand into the cybergargoyle's receiving module."

Its commencement will require an authorisation key in the form of the blood of a von Valancius. If you are ready, place a hand into the cybergargoyle's receiving module."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "{name}, my tech-comrades have spent the assigned number of cycles in prayer and vigil. Everything is prepared for the complementa-ritual of cleansing. Its commencement will require an authorisation key in the form of the blood of a von Valancius. If you are ready, place a hand into the cybergargoyle's receiving module."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「{name}、技術の同志たちは割り当てられた数のサイクルの祈りを捧げ、ビジリアを行った。全ては浄化の補足儀式のために準備されている。その開始には、フォン・ヴァランシウスの血という承認キーが必要となる。もしあなたの準備ができているならば、手をサイバーガーゴイルの受信モジュールの中へ入れるのだ」
languages.original_text: "{name}, my tech-comrades have spent the assigned number of cycles in prayer and vigil. Everything is prepared for the complementa-ritual of cleansing. Its commencement will require an authorisation key in the form of the blood of a von Valancius. If you are ready, place a hand into the cybergargoyle's receiving module."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、技術の同志たちは割り当てられた数のサイクルの祈りを捧げ、ビジリアを行った。全ては浄化の補足儀式のために準備されている。その開始には、フォン・ヴァランシウスの血という承認キーが必要となる。もしあなたの準備ができているならば、手をサイバーガーゴイルの受信モジュールの中へ入れるのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “{name}，我的技术同伴们已经按照规定的周期祷告守夜了。这一切都是为净化重组仪式准备的，举行仪式需要授权钥匙，即冯·瓦兰修斯家族的血液。如果你准备好了，把手伸进电子滴水嘴兽的接收模块就可以了。”
languages.original_text: "{name}, my tech-comrades have spent the assigned number of cycles in prayer and vigil. Everything is prepared for the complementa-ritual of cleansing. Its commencement will require an authorisation key in the form of the blood of a von Valancius. If you are ready, place a hand into the cybergargoyle's receiving module."

traits.locale_text: “{name}，我的兄弟们已经按照规定的周期祷告守夜了。这一切都是为净化重组仪式准备的，举行仪式需要授权钥匙，即冯·瓦兰修斯家族的血液。如果你准备好了，把手伸进电子滴水嘴兽的接收模块就可以了。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "{name}, meine Techkameraden haben die vorgegebene Anzahl an Zyklen im Gebet und bei der Andacht verbracht. Alles ist für das Complementa-Ritual der Säuberung vorbereitet. Um das Ritual zu beginnen, ist ein Schlüssel in der Form des Bluts eines von Valancius nötig. Wenn Ihr bereit seid, legt Eure Hand in das Empfangsmodul des Cybergargoyles."
languages.original_text: "{name}, my tech-comrades have spent the assigned number of cycles in prayer and vigil. Everything is prepared for the complementa-ritual of cleansing. Its commencement will require an authorisation key in the form of the blood of a von Valancius. If you are ready, place a hand into the cybergargoyle's receiving module."

traits.locale_text: "{name}, meine Brüder haben die vorgegebene Anzahl an Zyklen im Gebet und bei der Andacht verbracht. Alles ist für das Complementa-Ritual der Säuberung vorbereitet. Um das Ritual zu beginnen, ist ein Schlüssel in der Form des Bluts eines von Valancius nötig. Wenn Ihr bereit seid, legt Eure Hand in das Empfangsmodul des Cybergargoyles."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « {name}, mes technoconfrères ont consacré le nombre adéquat de cycles dans la veillée et la prière. Tout est prêt pour le rituel complémentaire de purification. Sa mise en œuvre nécessite une clé d'autorisation sous la forme du sang d'un représentant des von Valancius. Si vous êtes {mf|prêt|prête}, placez votre main dans le module réceptacle de la cybergargouille. »
languages.original_text: "{name}, my tech-comrades have spent the assigned number of cycles in prayer and vigil. Everything is prepared for the complementa-ritual of cleansing. Its commencement will require an authorisation key in the form of the blood of a von Valancius. If you are ready, place a hand into the cybergargoyle's receiving module."

traits.locale_text: « {name}, mes frères ont consacré le nombre adéquat de cycles dans la veillée et la prière. Tout est prêt pour le rituel complémentaire de purification. Sa mise en œuvre nécessite une clé d'autorisation sous la forme du sang d'un représentant des von Valancius. Si vous êtes {mf|prêt|prête}, placez votre main dans le module réceptacle de la cybergargouille. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «{name}, mis tecnocamaradas han dedicado el número de ciclos designado a la oración y la vigilia. Todo está preparado para el complementa-ritual de purificación. Para iniciarlo se requiere una clave de autorización que consiste en la sangre de un von Valancius. Si está {mf|listo|lista}, introduzca la mano en el módulo receptor de la cibergárgola».
languages.original_text: "{name}, my tech-comrades have spent the assigned number of cycles in prayer and vigil. Everything is prepared for the complementa-ritual of cleansing. Its commencement will require an authorisation key in the form of the blood of a von Valancius. If you are ready, place a hand into the cybergargoyle's receiving module."

traits.locale_text: «{name}, mis hermanos han dedicado el número de ciclos designado a la oración y la vigilia. Todo está preparado para el complementa-ritual de purificación. Para iniciarlo se requiere una clave de autorización que consiste en la sangre de un von Valancius. Si está {mf|listo|lista}, introduzca la mano en el módulo receptor de la cibergárgola».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Tekno yoldaşlarım, atanan sayıda dua ve ibadet döngüsünü tamamladı {name}. Tümleyici arındırma ayini için her şey hazır. Bidayeti için yetki anahtarı olarak von Valancius soyundan birinin kanı gerekecek. Hazırsanız elinizi sibergargoylun alıcı modülüne yerleştirin."
languages.original_text: "{name}, my tech-comrades have spent the assigned number of cycles in prayer and vigil. Everything is prepared for the complementa-ritual of cleansing. Its commencement will require an authorisation key in the form of the blood of a von Valancius. If you are ready, place a hand into the cybergargoyle's receiving module."

traits.locale_text: "{name}, tekno yoldaşlarım atanan sayıda dua ve ibadet döngüsünü tamamladı. Tümleyici arındırma ayini için her şey hazırlandı. Bidayeti için von Valancius soyundan birinin kanı vasıtasıyla yetki anahtarı gerekecek. Hazırsanız elinizi sibergargoylun alıcı modülüne yerleştirin."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
